metadata.shortInfo: Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

C. elegans mid-L4 N2 RNA-Seq sequences and alignments. Using polyA+ RNA isolated from C. elegans N2 L4 larva, we prepared and sheared double-stranded cDNA. A ~200 bp fraction was isolated and used to generate libraries for massively parallel sequencing on the Illumina instrument (36 bp reads). Using maq and cross_match, we aligned the reads to the genome and to splice junction and splice leader databases. Raw alignments show positions of uniquely mapping reads. Raw coverage files represent depth of coverage of read alignments. Windowed coverage represents the sum of the read coverage in a 51bp window surrounding each base.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 emb-thru-adult 454 alignments pilot. In this pilot study, 3UTRs were isolated from specific stages of C. elegans N2 worms, including embryos, L1, L2, L3, and L4 larva, and adults, and RNA isolated using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were barcoded, mixed together, and amplified, prior to sequencing on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

3RACE polyA-capture  daf-11 dauer 454 alignments. The 3 untranslated region (3UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

C. elegans Adult spe-9 RNA-Seq sequences and alignments. Using polyA+ RNA isolated from C. elegans spe-9 adults (8 days post-L4 molt), which fail to make viable embryos, we prepared and sheared double-stranded cDNA. A ~200 bp fraction was isolated and used to generate libraries for massively parallel sequencing on the Illumina instrument (36 bp reads). Using maq and cross_match, we aligned the reads to the genome and to splice junction and splice leader databases. Raw alignments show positions of uniquely mapping reads.  Raw coverage files represent depth of coverage of read alignments. Windowed coverage represents the sum of the read coverage in a 51bp window surrounding each base.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

spe-9 adult hermaphrodite 8 days post-L4 small ncRNA RNA-Seq. small RNAs (<200bp) were isolated from spe-9 adults 8 days post-L4, and sequenced using Illumina technology. Sequences were aligned to the WS180 genome using SOAP, and converted to SAM. Alignments were lifted to WS190 coordinates by the DCC.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE Illumina sequencing & alignment. Minipools containing 3'UTRs were amplified from mixed-stage N2 animals with target-specific primers.  These minipools may contain potentially different 3'UTR isoforms and were generated from cloning 3'RACE products for each targeted gene. Illumina generated sequences were aligned to the WS190 genome using Bowtie.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE Illumina sequencing & alignment. Minipools containing 3'UTRs were amplified from mixed-stage N2 animals with target-specific primers.  These minipools may contain potentially different 3'UTR isoforms and were generated from cloning 3'RACE products for each targeted gene. Illumina generated sequences were aligned to the WS190 genome using Bowtie.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 L1 454 alignments. 3UTRs were isolated from L1 larva of C. elegans N2 worms using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were sequenced on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, hermaphrodite adult stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

mid-L3 N2 hermaphrodite small ncRNA RNA-Seq. We aim to examine the changes in expression of non-coding small RNAs, including miRNAs and piRNAs/21U-RNAs, during development and aging, and in the different sexes of C. elegans using high-throughput sequencing technology Solexa. Additionally, we will identify novel small RNAs, especially novel miRNA candidates.

mid-L2 N2 hermaphrodite small ncRNA RNA-Seq. We aim to examine the changes in expression of non-coding small RNAs, including miRNAs and piRNAs/21U-RNAs, during development and aging, and in the different sexes of C. elegans using high-throughput sequencing technology Solexa. Additionally, we will identify novel small RNAs, especially novel miRNA candidates.

RNAseq - soma-only mid-L4 25dC 36hrs post-L1 JK1107 sequences & alignments. Using polyA+ RNA isolated from C. elegans JK1107 L4 larva (fails to make a gonad), we prepared and sheared double-stranded cDNA. A ~200 bp fraction was isolated and used to generate libraries for massively parallel sequencing on the Illumina instrument (36 bp reads). Using maq and cross_match, we aligned the reads to the genome and to splice junction and splice leader databases. Raw alignments show positions of uniquely mapping reads. Raw coverage files represent depth of coverage of read alignments. Windowed coverage represents the sum of the read coverage in a 51bp window surrounding each base.

RNAs were barcoded, mixed together, and amplified, prior to sequencing on the Roche 454 platform. Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

RNA-seq - pathogen Smacescens 25dC 24hr exposure post-adulthood N2 sequences & alignment. Using polyA+ RNA isolated from C. elegans adults exposed to S. macescens for 24hr, we prepared and sheared double-stranded cDNA. A ~200 bp fraction was isolated and used to generate libraries for massively parallel sequencing on the Illumina instrument (36 bp reads). Using maq and cross_match, we aligned the reads to the genome and to splice junction and splice leader databases. Raw alignments show positions of uniquely mapping reads. Raw coverage files represent depth of coverage of read alignments. Windowed coverage represents the sum of the read coverage in a 51bp window surrounding each base.

spe-9 adult hermaphrodite 5days post-L4 small ncRNA RNA-Seq. small RNAs (<200bp) were isolated from spe-9 L4 larvae, and sequenced using Illumina technology. Sequences were aligned to the WS180 genome using SOAP, and converted to SAM. Alignments were lifted to WS190 coordinates by the DCC.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 hermaphrodite 454 alignments. 3UTRs were isolated from adult hermaphrodites of C. elegans N2 worms using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were sequenced on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, hermaphrodite adult stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

C. elegans dauer exit daf-2 25dC 91hrs15dC 12hrs post-L1 RNA-Seq sequences and alignments. Using polyA+ RNA isolated from C. elegans daf-2 larva exiting the dauer stage, we prepared and sheared double-stranded cDNA. A ~200 bp fraction was isolated and used to generate libraries for massively parallel sequencing on the Illumina instrument (36 bp reads). Using maq and cross_match, we aligned the reads to the genome and to splice junction and splice leader databases. Raw alignments show positions of uniquely mapping reads.  Raw coverage files represent depth of coverage of read alignments. Windowed coverage represents the sum of the read coverage in a 51bp window surrounding each base.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 emb-thru-adult 454 alignments pilot. In this pilot study, 3UTRs were isolated from specific stages of C. elegans N2 worms, including embryos, L1, L2, L3, and L4 larva, and adults, and RNA isolated using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were barcoded, mixed together, and amplified, prior to sequencing on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 L3 454 alignments. 3UTRs were isolated from L3 larva of C. elegans N2 worms using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were sequenced on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, L3 stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

C. elegans mid-L3 N2 RNA-Seq sequences and alignments. Using polyA+ RNA isolated from C. elegans N2 L3 larva, we prepared and sheared double-stranded cDNA. A ~200 bp fraction was isolated and used to generate libraries for massively parallel sequencing on the Illumina instrument (36 bp reads). Using maq and cross_match, we aligned the reads to the genome and to splice junction and splice leader databases. Raw alignments show positions of uniquely mapping reads. Raw coverage files represent depth of coverage of read alignments. Windowed coverage represents the sum of the read coverage in a 51bp window surrounding each base.

spe-9 adult hermaphrodite 0days post-L4 small ncRNA RNA-Seq. small RNAs (<200bp) were isolated from spe-9 adults 5 days post-L4, and sequenced using Illumina technology. Sequences were aligned to the WS180 genome using SOAP, and converted to SAM. Alignments were lifted to WS190 coordinates by the DCC.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE Illumina sequencing & alignment. Minipools containing 3'UTRs were amplified from mixed-stage N2 animals with target-specific primers.  These minipools may contain potentially different 3'UTR isoforms and were generated from cloning 3'RACE products for each targeted gene. Illumina generated sequences were aligned to the WS190 genome using Bowtie.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

spe-9 adult hermaphrodite 12 days post-L4 small ncRNA RNA-Seq. small RNAs (<200bp) were isolated from spe-9 adults 12 days post-L4, and sequenced using Illumina technology. 3RACE polyA-capture daf-2 dauer 454 alignments. 3UTRs were isolated from dauer larva of C. elegans daf-2 worms using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were sequenced on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, dauer stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

miRNA isolation and 454 sequencing from fer-1 unfertilized oocytes. small RNAs (<200 bp) were isolated from unfertilized oocytes derived from fer-1 fertilization-defective adults and sequenced on the Roche 454 platform, and aligned to the WS190 genome using MegaBlast.

C. elegans Adult spe-9 RNA-Seq sequences and alignments. Using polyA+ RNA isolated from C. elegans spe-9 adults (8 days post-L4 molt), which fail to make viable embryos, we prepared and sheared double-stranded cDNA. A ~200 bp fraction was isolated and used to generate libraries for massively parallel sequencing on the Illumina instrument (36 bp reads). Using maq and cross_match, we aligned the reads to the genome and to splice junction and splice leader databases. Raw alignments show positions of uniquely mapping reads.  Raw coverage files represent depth of coverage of read alignments. Windowed coverage represents the sum of the read coverage in a 51bp window surrounding each base.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, dauer stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 embryo 454 alignments. 3UTRs were isolated from embryos of C. elegans N2 worms using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were sequenced on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, hermaphrodite adult stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

These minipools may contain potentially different 3'UTR isoforms and were generated from cloning 3'RACE products for each targeted gene. Illumina generated sequences were aligned to the WS190 genome using Bowtie.

metadata.shortInfo: RNA-Seq - pathogen Smacescens control OP50 25dC 24hr exposure post-adulthood N2 sequences & alignments. Using polyA+ RNA isolated from C. elegans adults (grown as a control for the S. macescens exposure), we prepared and sheared double-stranded cDNA. A ~200 bp fraction was isolated and used to generate libraries for massively parallel sequencing on the Illumina instrument (36 bp reads). Using maq and cross_match, we aligned the reads to the genome and to splice junction and splice leader databases. Raw alignments show positions of uniquely mapping reads. Raw coverage files represent depth of coverage of read alignments. Windowed coverage represents the sum of the read coverage in a 51bp window surrounding each base.

embryo N2 hermaphrodite small ncRNA RNA-Seq. We aim to examine the changes in expression of non-coding small RNAs, including miRNAs and piRNAs/21U-RNAs, during development and aging, and in the different sexes of C. elegans using high-throughput sequencing technology Solexa. Additionally, we will identify novel small RNAs, especially novel miRNA candidates.

RNA-seq - pathogen Smacescens 25dC 24hr exposure post-adulthood N2 sequences & alignment. Raw coverage files represent depth of coverage of read alignments. Windowed coverage represents the sum of the read coverage in a 51bp window surrounding each base.

miRNA isolation and Illumina sequencing from glp-4. small RNAs (<200 bp) were isolated from glp-4(bn2) young adults and sequenced on the Illumina platform, and aligned to the WS190 genome using MegaBlast.

miRNA isolation and Illumina sequencing from him-8 male spermatids. small RNAs (<200 bp) were isolated from spermatids from him-8 male worms and sequenced on the Illumina platform, and aligned to the WS190 genome using MegaBlast.

Raw coverage files represent depth of coverage of read alignments. Windowed coverage represents the sum of the read coverage in a 51bp window surrounding each base.

3RACE polyA-capture N2 L4 454 alignments. 3UTRs were isolated from L4 larva of C. elegans N2 worms using a poly-A capturing technique. RNAs were sequenced on the Roche 454 platform. This submission reflects the alignments of the deconvoluted, L4 stage-specific reads to WS190 genome using BLAT.

Mixed-stage 3'RACE 454 sequencing & alignment. The 3' untranslated region (3'UTR) constitutes a major site of post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression. Sequence elements in the 3'UTR interact with trans-acting regulators such as microRNAs that affect translation and stability. The overall aim is to use a 3'RACE cloning-sequencing stragety to identify the 3'UTRs of C. elegans transcripts and explore their heterogeneity in different developmental stages and tissues.

C. elegans dauer entry daf-2 25dC 48hrs post-L1 RNA-Seq sequences and alignments. Using polyA+ RNA isolated from C. elegans daf-2 larva entering the dauer stage, we prepared and sheared double-stranded cDNA. A ~200 bp fraction was isolated and used to generate libraries for massively parallel sequencing on the Illumina instrument (36 bp reads). Using maq and cross_match, we aligned the reads to the genome and to splice junction and splice leader databases. Raw alignments show positions of uniquely mapping reads.  Raw coverage files represent depth of coverage of read alignments. Windowed coverage represents the sum of the read coverage in a 51bp window surrounding each base.
